entities.name: mr moony
entities.description: Mr. Moony presents his compliments to Professor Snape, and begs him to keep his abnormally large nose out of other people’s business.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Snape froze. Harry stared, dumbstruck, at the message.

entities.name: mr prongs
entities.description: Mr. Prongs agrees with Mr. Moony, and would like to add that Professor Snape is an ugly git.

entities.name: mr padfoot
entities.description: “Mr. Padfoot would like to register his astonishment that an idiot like that ever became a professor.”

entities.name: mr wormtail
entities.description: “Mr. Wormtail bids Professor Snape good day, and advises him to wash his hair, the slimeball.”

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry closed his eyes in horror.

relationships.description: Mr. Moony presents his compliments to Professor Snape, and begs him to keep his abnormally large nose out of other people’s business.
Mr. Prongs agrees with Mr. Moony, and would like to add that Professor Snape is an ugly git.
“Mr. Padfoot would like to register his astonishment that an idiot like that ever became a professor.”
“Mr. Wormtail bids Professor Snape good day, and advises him to wash his hair, the slimeball.”
Harry closed his eyes in horror.
